1: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> שְׁתֵּ֨ים <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n> עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <sup>6240 </sup> <n>ten</n> שָׁנָה֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>Manasseh</n> בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>when he began to reign</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>fifty</n> וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>and five</n> שָׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> מָלַ֖ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>and reigned</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> וְשֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> אִמּ֖וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>And his mother's</n> חֶפְצִי־ בָֽהּ׃ <sup>2657 </sup> <n>[was] Hephzibah</n>
2: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And he did</n> הָרַ֖ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>[that which was] evil</n> בְּעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> כְּתֽוֹעֲבֹת֙ <sup>8441 </sup> <n>after the abominations</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>cast out</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>whom the LORD</n> מִפְּנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
3: וַיָּ֗שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>again</n> וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>For he built up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַבָּמ֔וֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>the high places</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אִבַּ֖ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>had destroyed</n> חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>which Hezekiah</n> אָבִ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> וַיָּ֨קֶם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and he reared up</n> מִזְבְּחֹ֜ת <sup>4196 </sup> <n>altars</n> לַבַּ֗עַל <sup>1168 </sup> <n>for Baal</n> וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and made</n> אֲשֵׁרָה֙ <sup>842 </sup> <n>a grove</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֗ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>as did</n> אַחְאָב֙ <sup>256 </sup> <n>Ahab</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worshipped</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> צְבָ֣א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>all the host</n> הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>and served</n> אֹתָֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
